data.title: Telugu cinema news
data.text:
Harish - NTR film is not MLA

Harish Shankar narrated the script of MLA - a political film a few years back (much before he has made Mirapakai) to NTR and he liked it very much. After that the film was not materialised. Harish Shankar’s next film now is going to star NTR. When asked Harish Shankar if this film is MLA, Harish said he is doing an entirely different script for this film and it is going to be an entertainer. The reason for the change of subject could be that there are many political films that are released in this gap like Shakuni.

Eega gets U/A certificate

Eega film got censored today and obtained U/A certificate by the censor board. Rajamouli’s ambitious project Eega is releasing in 3 languages (Telugu, Tamil & Malayam) simultaneously on 6 July with over 1000 prints. Sudeep plays the most important role in this film where as Nani is doing the role of a lover who gets killed to be incarnated as eega. Samantha plays female lead. Rajamouli wanted to release Eega on 30 March. But the film got delayed over 2 months due to CG work. MM Keeravani is the music director and Senthil Kumar handles cinematography.

Prabhas dubs for Vishnu

Prabhas is dubbing for a few dialogues of Vishnu in Denikaina Ready film. There are certains scenes in this film in which Vishnu tells dialogues like Prabhas. The climax shoot of Vishnu’s latest film Denikaina Ready is complete. The talkie part is almost over. The shooting of 3 songs is left. G Nageswara Reddy who has directed many comedy flicks in the past is directing this entertainer. Chakri composed music. Yuvan Shankar Raja also composed a couple of songs. MS Narayana’s son Vikram is doing a negative role in this movie. Hansika Motwani plays female lead. Mohan Babu produces this film on 24 Frames Factory banner. This film is also going to be released in Tamil simultaneously.

Vijayawada satires in SVSC

Director Srikanth Addala proved himself as a director of good romance, sentiment and entertainment with his debut film Kotha Bangaru Lokam. The phrase ‘e-kaa-daa’ became instantly popular. The butler English of the warden is also a hit with the masses. It is reliably learnt that his latest film Seetamma Vakitlo Sirimalle Chettu has a satire on the slang of Vijayawada as heroes characters (Mahesh Babu and Venkatesh) are from Vijayawada. You have to wait and watch how hilariously these scenes came out once the movie hits the marquee in September. The teaser released in the last month-end generated tremendous response. Dil Raju produces this film.

DCM music launch on 16 June

The music of Puri Jagan’s latest film Devudu Chesina Manushulu is bought for a good price by Sony Music. The music will be launched at a function organized on 16 of this month. Raghu Kunche who has shot to fame with his song ‘Enduke Ramanamma’ from Bumper Offer is scoring music for Puri Jagan for the first time. Speaking to idlebrain.com, Raghu Kunche said, “Working with Puri Jagan is a new experience. He gives us more freedom and the freedom given by him translates into confidence. Once we have confidence on our work, we deliver the best. The music of DCM is going to rock.” Ravi Teja and Ileana play main leads. Bhogavalli Prasad produced this movie.

Avunu trailer gets great response

Ravi Babu is known for sticking to his style and doing sensible cinemas. He has acquired a group of audiences for himself over a period of time with a wide spectrum of the subjects. The theatrical trailer of his latest film Avunu (click here to watch it) is released with Endukante Premanta film and creating nice buzz. Speaking to idlebrain.com, Ravi Babu said the purpose of this trailer is to explain the genre of the movie and get more eye balls. He has chosen a black and white old film format to narrate the story of the film and then ended the trailer with title justification. He says that it’s inspired by a true story that is narrated by an actress who worked with him in the past. This film has family orientation with thrilling elements. He is producing this movie on his home banner Flying Frogs with the support of Suresh Productions and PVP Cinema.

Ram getting roasted in Guntur

Ram is known for his uttermost dedication when it come to his acting profession. Since his latest movie in the direction of Bommarillu Bhaskar has market yard backdrop, the producer Bhogavalli Prasad fixed on the famous Guntur Mirchi Market yard. This market yard works for all the days of an year except for 30 days in summer which is unbearable to work. The producer has hired that market yard for shoot when it is closed down. Since Guntur is known for extremeties in heat during the summer, the entire unit is forced to undergo a gruelling schedule in this scorching summer.

Dasari buys Julayi

As per the sources of idlebrain.com, Siri Media owned by Dasari Narayana Rao has bought the theatrical rights of Allu Arjun’s latest film Julayi for entire Andhra Pradesh. Ileana is paired up with Allu Arjun for the first time. Devi Sri Prasad composes music. Allu Arjun is acting in Trivikram’s direction for the first time. Shooting of the film is complete but for two songs. Music will be launched in the first week of June and movie is expected to release in the same month. Radha Krishna is producing this movie on Harika and Hasini Creations banner.

Confusion over Eega and EP release dates

There has been confusion among the release dates of Eega and Eandukante Premanta. As per the sources of idlebrain.com, a gap of 15 days between the release dates is being planned. As per the last tweet of Rajamouli, Eega is supposed to go for censoring on 21 May and is touted to release by 30 May. However, the last minute delay in graphic work prompted him to postpone the release to next month and the buyers were supposedly informed that Eega will release by the middle of June. Hence Sravanthi Ravi Kishore has planned to release EP on 1st June. However, sudden rumors about Bala Krishna’s Adhinayakudu being planned in 1st June seem to have prompted some confusion among the trading circles. With YS Jagan’s alleged future arrest and the subsequent turmoil might also add more doubts regarding film releases during this time. It is also learnt that Endukante Premanta is going for censoring tomorrow. We have to wait for the exact release date from the horse’s mouth soon!

Sekhar Kammula at his own pace

Though recognized as a popular film director, Sekhar Kammula still is not a part of typical film nagar set up. He makes movies in his own and sells them in his own way. Despite getting continuous blockbuster, he has not become commercial. He has arranged a press meet and announced for star hunt 3rd September 2010. He has taken a lot of time to select new actors and start the movie ‘Life is Beautiful’. Sekhar Kammula doesn’t have the habit of letting media know about the progress of the movie. He comes to media only after wrapping up the movie. The distributors were given an indication that film would be ready by January 2012. However, a last minute hick-up about heroine being replaced by Shriya seemed to have prompted delay in shoot and release. The distributors are expecting the movie to release this summer. We have to wait and see when Sekhar Kammula comes out and announces the news of shoot completion.

Endukante Premanta is a bilingual

Producer Sravanthi Ravi Kishore is doing his latest film Endukante Premanta in Telugu and Tamil. The Tamil version is titled as Yen Endraal Kaadhal Enben. As you might be aware that Ram is brought up in Chennai and is extremely good with Tamil language. Shooting of this film is complete except for a couple of songs. The entire film was shoot both in Telugu and Tamil. Tamanna is paired up with Ram for the first time. Karunakaran is also making his debut as director in Tamil with this movie. GV Prakash composes music. Anu Hassan plays a vital role.

Nag says no to Politics

There has been a speculation in media that Nagarjuna is going to enter politics. In a jewellery shop opening at Trupati Nagarjuna said that he keenly follows politics. However, Nagarjuna put an end to all these speculations by tweeting ‘I am not getting into politics.... Thank you’. Nagarjuna is currently having an image makeover in film as he wants to do good, honest and different movies (Gaganam, Rajanna, Dhamarukam, Shirdi Sai to name a few).

It’s treasure hunt for Chandu-Gopi film

Chandra Sekhar Yeleti who shot to fame with different and urbane flicks like Aithe and Anukokunda Oka Roju is doing an adventurous film with Gopichand as hero. This film is an adventurous thriller dealing with treasure hunt. This movie will be extensively shot in locations like Jordan, Rajasthan, Ladak etc. Bhogavalli Prasad is producing it. Sri composes music. Prasanth Atluri and Sumalatha pen dialogues. Shamdatt (Prasthanam fame) handles cinematography and Ravinder (Magadheera fame) is the art director. The regular shoot will start in the 1st week of April and film will be release in September. Reliance Entertainment is presenting this movie. Muhurat of this movie was held on the morning of 26 February with Rajamouli as chief guest.

Mahesh enters SVSC on 16

Mahesh Babu is doing a family subject Seetamma Vakitlo Sirimalle Chettu (SVSC) in the direction of Srikanth Addala who has proved his mettle with Kotha Bangaru Lokam. Venkatesh is doing elder brother role. Samanth is paired up with Mahesh. Though the shooting was started, Mahesh Babu is yet to enter the sets. He will be entering the sets of SVSC on 16 February. He has taken a gap of 2 months after doing two back to back films Dookudu and Businessman. Mahesh Babu has recently gone to Thailand to do a TV commercial.

High court upsets Subhash Ghai’s institute

Subhash Ghai has established a world-class film institute ‘Whistling Woods’. The High Court of Maharashtra gave a judgment that the 20 acre plot given to Subhash Ghai should be taken back as the land was sold at a throw-away price of 3 crores against the market value of 31 crores. Subhash Ghai has used 5 acres so far to built the film institute. Subhash Ghai is planning to appeal to Supreme Court and told that Whistling Woods is not a business venture and it is a mission of his life time.

Siddharth’s 5 releases this year

Siddharth is is currently active in four languages (Telugu, Tamil, Hindi and English). He is likely to debut in Malayalam industry in this year. As per the sources of idlebrain.com, Siddharth has got at least five releases lined up this year. His production debut ‘Love Failure’ is expected to release in the middle of February. His English film ‘Midnight’s Children’ directed by Deepa Mehta and based on the acclaimed novel with the same name will also release in this year. Siddharth’s Hindi film in the direction of David Dhawan will also release in this year. His next Telugu film Sukumarudu in the direction of Ashok (Pilla Zamindar fame) will start shooting soon and is expected to hit the marquee in this year. He also has another film in the direction of Nandini Reddy (Ala Modalaindi fame). It is also learnt that Siddharth is reading a potential script in Malayalam and likely to do that film. He will also act in the production of popular Tamil director Vetrimaran who is penning the story as well. With so many films in the line up, Siddharth is going to have atleast one release every two months in this year. Apart from acting, Siddharth is known for his fine taste in picking the right music. Music albums of all his films were appreciated irrespective the box office results of his films. As a playback singer, he sung around nine songs so far (including apudo ipudo from Bommarillu and Maa Daddy Pockets from Oh My Friend).

Neeku Naaku Dash Dash in March

Teja is wielding megaphone after a gap of four years. His last film was Keka which didn’t do well at box office. His latest film Neeku Naaku Dash Dash is nearing completion. He has introduced many actors (Uday Kiran, Nitin, Gopichand, Navadeep, Aadhi (son of Raviraja Pinisetti) etc) in the past. He is introducing all new actors with Neeku Naaku Dash Dash. A new music director is also being introduced. Rasool handles cinematography. This film will be released in the last week of March when the exams season is over. Neeku Naaku Dash Dash is a youth film.

Allu Arjun’s dedication

Allu Arjun has always been a fighter since he entered film industry. Like Chiranjeevi, he was also an under dog when he entered the film industry and all he had to do was work hard. He is continuing the same tradition of dedication and hard work even after he has got thumping hits. Allu Arjun is currently working in the direction of Trivikram. A rain fight was canned yesterday in Ramoji Film City in the action choreography of Peter Heins. The temperature at the sets was 7 degrees when the fight was canned. Trivikram has changed his working style with this movie and shooting the film at a brisk pace.

Only 2 biggies this Pongal

Businessman and Bodyguard are the only big films that are releasing for this Sankranthi. Both Nippu and Poola Rangadu are postponed to 2 February. Businessman starring Mahesh got censored recently and the producers are planning with grand premieres on 10th in USA. The Indian release is going to be on 11 Jan. Venkatesh’s Bodyguard will release with premieres in USA on 9 January and Indian release will be there on 12 Jan. Businessman is expected to garner humongous openings as it’s being released after blockbuster Dookudu and it is coming in the combination of industry hit Pokiri. Venkatesh’s Bodyguard is going to get heavy openings as Hindi version of Bodyguard became big hit which proves that the script has good commercial viability. Music for both these films is scored by Thaman.

Brahmaji in a father role

Brahmaji who has grabbed fame with innocent comic roles in films like Athadu and Ek Niranjan seems to be making a shift now. He is doing the role of father in Varun Sandesh’s latest film in Neelakanta’s direction. It is learnt that he is donning the role of Varun Sandesh in this movie. Since the father is supposed to look younger in the film, Brahmaji has been cast in the movie. Shooting of this film was started recently and DS Rao who produced recently released Pilla Zamindar is producing this film.

Sri Ramarajyam at film festival

It’s a known fact that International film festival is organized by Government of India in Goa in the last week of November. The 42nd International film festival of India was inaugurated today in Goa. The CEO of International Film festival has asked for print of Sri Ramarajyam so that around 500 international jourlists can watch Sri Ramarajyam on 28 of November. Sri Ramarajyam movie is a visual treat that encompasses a brilliant story telling combined with spell binding graphics. it not only exhibits but also portrays a very important part of indian spiritual and cultural history.

Mohan Babu completes 36 years

Mohan Babu’s debut film Swargam Narakam was released on 22 November 1975. And he has completed 36 years as an actor today. He has seen highs and lows in career, but made a remarkable impact on Telugu cinema with her versatility and wide range of roles ranging from hero to villain. Mohan Babu has earned the tag of collection king when he completed a double hattrick as hero in mid 90’s. His film Pedda Rayudu was one of the top grossers of Telugu cinema and biggest hit in the career of Mohan Babu. Mohan Babu has recovered the government’s most prestegious honor ‘Padma Sri’ few years back. Mohan Babu has incorporated Sri Vidya Niketan and has abandoned the caste column in application forms in order to serve the people regardless of caste. Sri Vidya Niketan is one of the most honerable education brand in AP today. Idlebrain.com congratulates Mohan Babu on this momentous occasion.

Its My Love Story in Tamil

Madhura Sridhar’s latest film It’s My Love Story is going to be dubbed in Tamil and released by the producer Shiva. Sridhar has shot two versions for the climax - one sad and one happy. He has kept the happy ending for Telugu version and he is going to incorporate sad version for Hindi. He is going to have reshoot of few scenes with vital characters in order to do a few Tamil nativity changes.

SVSC to get on sets on 5 December

Dil Raju’s multi-starrer Seetamma Vakitlo Sirimalle Chettu is going to start shooting on 5 December. It will start with the episodes of Venkatesh. Mahesh Babu will enter the sets of SVSC by 25 January. The shooting will be wrapped up with May and Dil Raju is planning to release the movie for June. Venkatesh and Mahesh play brothers in this family oriented film. Samantha is paired up with Mahesh. Micky J Meyer will compose music.

2 crores for a Shankar’s song

Shankar is known for exquisite taste when it comes to shooting songs. He has gone to the special place of ‘Machu Picchu’ in Peru to shoot a song in his last movie Robo. As per the sources of idlebrain.com, Shankar has spent around 2 crores to shoot a song in his remake of 3 Idiots. This is said to be a wild card to attract children to this cinema. This film is releasing in Tamil as Nanban. This film features Vijay, Jeeva, Sriram and Ileana in the main leads. The Tamil and Telugu versions are expected to release for Sankranthi 2012.

Dil Raju sells 2 lac tickets with one song

Dil Raju has terrific business sense. He has kept a song ’Sri Chaitanya Junior College’ which refers to the most successful group of colleges in AP - Sri Chaitanya. They have over 2 lacs of students all over AP. He has also conducted disc function of the Oh My Friend in Kukatpally’s vast campus amidst 5000 brimming students. Dil Raju is confident that Oh My Friend will lure all the students (not only Sri Chaitanya) to theaters because the film deals about the thin line between love and friendship.

Two love stories on 11-11-11

Dil Raju’s Oh My Friend and Madhura Sridhar’s It’s My Love Story are going to release on the same day of 11-11-11. Both these films are said to be dealing with the concept of love versus friendship. Music of both these films has become popular. One is a big star cast film and other is a film done with new faces. We have to wait and see how these two films are going to fare.

OMF disc function at Sri Chaitanya

Dil Raju who is known for his business acumen made sure that he is promoting movie in an innovative way. There is a song ‘Sri Chaitanya Junior College’ in OMF which is rendered fervently by actor Siddharth and actress Shruti Hassan. Since this song is about boys and girls of Sri Chaitanya college, Dil Raju has selected Sri Chaitanya College in Kukatpally as a venue for the disc function. Around 5000 boys and girls of Sri Chaitanya college will attended this event on the evening of 5 November. OMF is all set to release on 11-11-11.

Aswini Dutt’s noble deed

Aswini Dutt might come across as a stern businessman in film industry circles. But he is a man with heart of gold. As we know Tamil’s diwali blockbuster Velayudham is a remake of Telugu film Azad produced by Aswini Dutt. It was directed by Tirupati Swamy who died a few years after the release. When the producer of Velayudham approached Aswini Dutt for the Tamil remake rights of Azad, Aswini Dutt sold it at a steep price. He searched for the family members of Tirupati Swamy and gave away the entire amount he earned through the sale of Azad remake rights to the family members of Tirupati Swamy. It is such a noble deed by a top class producer.

The Businessman first look on 11-11-11

Puri Jagan who is known for swiftness and agrression while making movie is making sure that he is doing a quality film in limited time. The shooting of The Businessman is currently going on in Goa in full swing. Producer Venkat is planning to release the first look of Businessman on 11 of November - a two months ahead of the release. The music will be launched in December and movie will release on 11 January 2012.

Trivikram controls budget

Trivikram who is known as a director with high-budget taste is making sure to get rid of that tag with his next movie with Allu Arjun as hero. He cuts down his remuneration and Allu Arjun did also cut his remuneration. Trivikram is negotiating with Ileana to give them some concession. Trivikram is going to sets with a bound-script and is making sure that the movie is going to shot in limited number of working days. Trivikram is aiming to give producer Danayya an opportunity for making table profit with this movie. Trivikram’s latest film with Allu Arjun will go to sets on 2 November.

‘Chaata’ Ali is back

Ali who did hilarious performance as ‘chaata’ in Rajendrudu Gajendrudu movie is all set to redo that character. As per the source of idlebrain.com, Ali is playing the chaata character again in Dil Raju’s forthcoming film Oh My Friend. Oh My Friend is all set to release on 11-11-11. Initially Siddharth too the overseas distribution rights of this movie. However, Dil Raju has bought the rights back from him recently. Dil Raju who released his last blockbuster Mr. Perfect in USA is going to release it on his own for Oh My Friend as well.

3 biggies this Sankranthi

Sankranthi 2012 is going to have three biggies namely - The Businessman (Mahesh Babu), Adhinayakudu (Bala Krishna) and Nippu (Ravi Teja). The likely release dates will be 11, 12 and 13 of January. As per the sources of idlebrain.com, Ram Charan Tej’s Racha might not release for Sankranthi. Bala Krishna’s Samara Simha Reddy and Narasimha Naidu went on to become industry hits by releasing for Sankranthi. Mahesh Babu’s Okkadu was released for Sankranthi. Ravi Teja’s latest blockbusters Krishna and Mirapakai were released for Sankranthi. Sankranthi is a kind of season that can take 3 hits at a time. We have to wait and see which film will make the cash registers ringing.
